name: V&D Labs
description:
Founded in June 2010, V&D Labs has grown to over 40 of the most talented developers, designers and user interface experts throughout the world. A known world-leader of mobile/web solutions for iPhone, iPad, Android and Blackberry devices, V&D Labs works closely with clients to provide all manners of technology-based solutions, including sophisticated online and desktop application applications.
Our approach is to move with speed, to collaborate as an extension of the client’s senior team, and harness energy, innovation thinking - that catapults our clients’ likelihood of success in the marketplace.
